sentences.sContent: One more detail: one of the railroad branch lines ran not far from the hospital. There was a heavy gun on a specially equipped open flatcar connected to a locomotive.
sentences.sContent_eng: One more detail: one of the railroad branch lines ran not far from the hospital. There was a heavy gun on a specially equipped open flatcar connected to a locomotive.
sentences.sCn: 有一个细节：离医院不远的一条铁路支线上有一列列车，上边有一节开放式的货车连着机车，货车上安放有一门重炮。

synos.tran: 无盖货车；平台型铁路货车

trans.tranCn: 无盖货车, 平台货车
trans.tranOther: a railway carriage without a roof or sides, used for carrying goods
